cast.name: 杰罗姆·布克斯 Jerome Ro Brooks
杰夫科斯·格林 Jevocas Green
Darryl D. Moore Darryl D. Moore

trans_title: 霹雳娇娃前传之杰克的战队
introduction: The "Jack Squad” is the urban tale of three women who have nothing but money on their minds after each one has a loss of financial in***e. Childhood best friends Kennedy, Mona, and Dawn embark on a plan to seduce and rob wealthy men. Using cunning acts of seduction and betrayal, the girls go full speed ahead with charm and sex as their weapons to be***e financially independent. Soon, however, everything backfires when they get involved with a vicious Under-Lord and a murder counters their actions. The women be***e enveloped in a world of deceit and murder, as they discover that what ***es around goes around. It is now up to them to figure out what the next step is and how to get out of this vicious cycle of death before it is too late.
chinese_title: 霹雳娇娃前传之杰克的战队
